website_summaries.verdict: Highly potent supplement in gelcap form amplified by coconut oil.
pros: Same biologically active form of vitamin D the body makes in the sun, without harmful UV radiation
Manufacturer claims that added coconut oil enhances body's absorption of the vitamin
cons: Some complaints that "regular" coconut oil was added instead of virgin coconut oil
Random complaints of gelcaps smelling rancid

customer_reviews.title: It Works.
customer_reviews.text: Back in 2007 my former doctor had me on prescription vitamin d. My deficiency was so bad that I was taking 50,000 iu's daily. About 3 years ago new doctor told me to just start taking over-the-counter vitamin d3. I did my research and we tried several brands. For the past several months our entire family's been taking Sports Research Vitamin D3 (5000iu). I am happy to report that as of my last physical my Vitamin D levels are in healthy range.
customer_reviews.author: Virginnie

customer_reviews.title: Only get vegan D3...the standard kind is horrifying, here’s why...
customer_reviews.text: Vegan vitamin D3 is the only way to go. The standard vitamin D industry is kinda scary...they strip their vitamin did via gathering the oils off of sheep wool after stuffing said sheep into a packed area where they are now only meant for vitamin D production and live a horrible life. But hey, even if you’re heartless and don’t care about animals, taking vitamin D from wool oils is disgusting...when you can take the REAL, BETTER form...from a friggin’ plant. It’s kind of a no brained. This brand for the better, higher quality vitamin D choice, is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Van Vuren

customer_reviews.title: 5,000 IU or 2,500? Weird discrepancy
customer_reviews.text: So the bottle says a serving is 1 softgel, and that it is 125 mcg (5,000 IU), 625% Daily Value of D3. All of the other sources I’ve been looking up says 5,000 IU should be 1250%. The yellow bottle in my pictures is of Garden of Life Raw D3, also 5,000 IU, and they state 1250%. One of the pictures is a food tracking app I use and it calculated 625% as 2,500 IU. So half. Hmmmm. I’m not very careful about taking vitamins everyday, but if you need a strict dose, I wouldn’t trust this brand.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this because I liked the idea of coconut oil in the capsule
customer_reviews.text: I have a vitamin D deficiency and take supplements to maintain my levels. I ordered this because I liked the idea of coconut oil in the capsule. However, my vitamin D levels dropped significantly after I started taking this supplement (per blood tests). If you are just taking this because you like the idea of taking vitamin D it's probably not an issue, but I would not recommend this product to anyone who needs a supplement due to a deficiency.
customer_reviews.author: ruthie h

customer_reviews.title: Product smells rancid and does not get cloudy like coconut oil should
customer_reviews.text: Product smells rancid and does not get cloudy like coconut oil should. I bout a bottle of K2 in coconut oil in the same purchase and it has a pleasant smell and gets cloudy as it should. I'll be returning this D3 and looking for another option.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Is it REALLY Coconut Oil? It doesn't harden and capsules dont get cloudy like my other ones.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered by mistake. Usually use the Vit D3 and K2 by Sports Research. These D3 capsules dont use Organic Coconut Oil and seem to be using refined oil. Coconut oil gets cloudy when cold. These do not. Wanted to return so I could order my usual vitamins by them but wasnt allowed. I've just wasted $15 I guess as wont take refined coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: Countrylife

customer_reviews.title: No longer in coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a bottle of this a few weeks ago and was happy with product. So I ordered another for my girlfriend and was surprised that the newest bottle was different. The new gel caps were not cloudy even when placed in fridge for an hour. This means this newer batch is in another type of oil... not coconut oil. I'm gonna try to contact company to see if there was an issue with this particular batch. The batch numbers and dates are different on the 2 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: Anything that's vegan and honestly made, has my vote. I wish all your products were vegan, as it seems strange that you're selling collagen (which comes from animals unless it is specified as a vegan collagen and is seriously cruel and inhumane), but I appreciate the baby steps of selling some vegan products and hope you'll continue down that path. Peace.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: It is a vegan D3 Supplement and it Works!- According to my Lab Results
customer_reviews.text: I have been having vitamin D deficiency and since I learned that I have been using this supplement. Today I got my new lab result today and My Vitamin D3 level got to normal ranges, which I am super happy for! If you are looking for a vegan D3 supplement this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Burcu

customer_reviews.title: Helping my nails grow a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I was wondering why my nails were growing faster than normal then I remembered I've been taking these pills for about a week now. I got them the same day I got my manicure and they've already grown out so much. No side effects and working great for me! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Leeitah

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle of vitamin D3 2000iu from this company. My first bottle had organic coconut oil on the label. The second bottle is just coconut oil. Plus the pills don't get cloudy when they are cold. The formula has changed! Coconut oil solidifies when it gets cold, hence cloudy pills. The pills I have now stay clear. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stathum

customer_reviews.title: Verified by 3 month blood tests.
customer_reviews.text: As a lawyer, I spend the entire day inside and away from sunlight (other than the light from my office window. In June, my Dr. advised that my Vit. D levels were at low and required that I seek supplementation. Without adding any other supplement, I purchased these and took 1 to 2 per day for 90 days. Following my 90 day check up, my Dr. advised that my numbers have doubled and are now will within the recommended range. This product works. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: AC Nash, esq.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap refined coconut oil.
customer_reviews.text: Apparently they changed the ingredients from Virgin Organic Coconut Oil to cheap refined Coconut Oil. I will return it and look for a more healthy option.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My vitamin was low and my doctor advised me to take 50,000ui a week for 4 weeks. Since I’m vegan, I needed to find a vegan vitamin because the one prescribed has animal byproducts in them. My doctor was kind enough to do a search and advised me to purchase these. I have it a try and my numbers are up. Plus I love the fact that you all use organic coconut oil. I couldn’t be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: Niki P.

customer_reviews.title: Product has a very rotten smell
customer_reviews.text: Something has changed with this product. I’ve taken this for a while and opened up a new bottle. It did not smell like the previous bottle (nice coconut scent) but instead rotten dead fish. It was terrible!!! Called Amazon and asked what happened and they refunded me. I love Sport Research products but this was a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: krissriley

customer_reviews.title: These gave me a headache and I felt nauseous all ...
customer_reviews.text: These gave me a headache and I felt nauseous all day. I knew they were high potency, but unless you have a diagnosed deficiency I'd stay away from these. They are at the upper limit of what's tolerable in the average adult.
customer_reviews.author: TMF

customer_reviews.title: Smells absolutely revolting.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the bottle I noticed a rotten smell from it. It was nothing like coconut or any of the other vitamin D supplements I've been on. I checked the expiration date and it's supposed to be good for another 3 years. This is nothing I could ever bring myself to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Herz

customer_reviews.title: Smells extremely bad!
customer_reviews.text: I received my Vitamin D3 today and upon opening them I smelt a very nasty odor, it smelt like a mixture of rotten fish & poop. I gag anytime I take a smell, I am very disappointed, I will be purchasing without the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Vegan source of D3! I keep purchasing this because I notice the results very quickly and the results last. I think it is because it is not a lanolin based product. I actually bite down on the capsule to get the liquid into my system faster than waiting for it to be digested and the taste is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry J.

customer_reviews.title: Probably A Placebo
customer_reviews.text: I'd been taking one of these daily for about a month before going in for my annual blood work. When I got my results in, my Vitamin D reading was a 34.9 ng/mL, where the acceptable range was 30 to 100. Since I was taking these Vitamin D supplements, I would have expected a much higher reading. This leaves me to believe that the Vitamin D in these capsules is not absorbed very well.
customer_reviews.author: jp2code

customer_reviews.title: Notice how the D is big? lol
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, definitely reduces the oiliness of my skin and has had an interesting affect on libido in combination with zinc supplementation.
customer_reviews.author: MLavore

customer_reviews.title: After learning about all the things Vitamin D3 can do and help with I was sold and felt like I should give it a go and see for .
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after doing a lot of research and found that Sports Research does their work when making supplements. After learning about all the things Vitamin D3 can do and help with I was sold and felt like I should give it a go and see for myself. At this price point you really can't afford not to. It's been a few weeks now and I've noticed an upswing in my mood which is just one of the factors this can affect. As with any supplement do the research yourself and see if the things listed are things you're lacking. If so give it a try and see if it helps, it has for me!
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Peltz

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously Wrong Amount of Vit D3
customer_reviews.text: Went on their website to check the third part certification for the Lot of the bottle I received; the certificate says that each softgel contains 7160 UI (179 mcg) and not 5000 (125 mcg). More than 2000 UI is a lot!! The certificate states: "This analysis or component is not ISO accredited"
customer_reviews.author: ARS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality supplement although vegan version expensive
customer_reviews.text: Vitamin D supplement is bioavailable form (D3 over D2), capsules are good size to be convenient, and blood levels of vitamin D responded appropriately with this supplementation. Living in Michigan vitamin D levels were low which is no surprise. Overall happy aside from the vegan version being cost prohibitive. Buying the non-vegan version for spouse.
customer_reviews.author: Hapboosmil

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: The last decade I've had consistant low vitamin D. I was bald around the crown of my head, nails were fragile, slow wound healing, candida. I suffered from depression and sleepless nights along with many other symptoms of low vitamin D. With these supplements I noticed my symptoms improve in the first 3 days. I'm one month into taking the supplements and it has been lofe changing!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Q

customer_reviews.title: Helps a lot!!
customer_reviews.text: Has helped immensely as I was lacking this and other vitamins for years. Women if you have menstration pain issues such as or like endometriosis look into vitamin d3 along with other supplements like the evening primrose from sports research it has reduced my pains 85-90% that I can actually function now. Super tiny gel capsules easy to swallow. I bought the lowest dose that came with a year worth and I can easily increase my dose if needed but I haven’t needed to. Supplemented with magnesium, zinc and iron to get what is missing causing fatigue during the time of the month and helps a lot with inflammation.
customer_reviews.author: Blasianprincess25

customer_reviews.title: My preferred D3 source
customer_reviews.text: I love these because they are little and coconut oil based. I take 8 at a time and in one swallow with no problems and I love the coconut oil based due to being keto. The only thing I wish was that they had a 10,000 IU version of this pill so I only had to take fewer but it's so easy to swallow either way. Be sure to take 100mcg of Vitamin K2 along with every 10,000 IU of D3 to avoid hypercalcemia. Everyone taking D3 should also be taking vitamin K2 to avoid hypercalcemia and make sure that the calcium in your body is used properly.
customer_reviews.author: JJ420

customer_reviews.title: good quality vtiamins
customer_reviews.text: just wish these came in 10,000iu. These are nice sized no wierd after burps. The coconut oil does solidify at room temp and turns clear when warm, but the big jar of coconut oil I have in my bathroom does that too. Just had my Vitamin D levels check (I have Multiple Sclerosis) and even after a relapse my vitamin D levels were good.
customer_reviews.author: QueenCashew

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: I 'd been having some health issues (joint pain being the primary). After a great deal of lab work I was told that my vitamin D level was very low. After doing some research I purchased the Sports Research D3. 6 weeks later the lab work was repeated and my vitamin D level came back in range. Feeling much better.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Best D3 Pills Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely the best D3 pills out there for the money. I've done some research and since I'm chronically low on Vitamin D3, I need to take two of these a day for 5 days a week to get what I need from them. I get my levels checked every six months and after previously receiving them as a gift, my levels have been on par, so I know they contain what the label says they do. Most people don't even know they're D3 deficient and its important to maintain your levels to keep healthy, so try them out for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sterry

customer_reviews.title: Highly Reccomended
customer_reviews.text: I have had chronically low Vitamin D for several years. This is the first product to bring it up. I have been taking 2 daily for about 6 months and my Vitamin D went from 23 to 67. I have tried all kinds of things and never got it out of the 20's! This is an excellent quality Vitamin and I am very very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya K

customer_reviews.title: Great (best?) D3 supplement on the market
customer_reviews.text: I've recently turned 40 and have been using the 5000IU D3 supplements for about a year now at the suggestion of my wellness specialist. Over this period of time, I have gotten sick maybe once or twice and if I do, it lasts for about a day or two. I'm surrounded by sick adults/kids on a daily basis and yet have not contracted any of the ailments that have surrounded me. I also do not take flu shots. Update: been over a year and still taking it!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Heffernan

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: I refuse to take vitamin D that smells rotten. The manufactured date is less than 3 months ago. I just received this, opened the bottle and was hit with the most disgusting aroma of any supplement that I've ever purchased. I am very disappointed. Most of the reviews were favorable, so this is very unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this vitamin D3 product. Vitamin D is a fat-soluble vitamin, so the fact that Sports Research uses coconut oil for better absorption is a major plus. Most of the vitamin D3 supplements you find in stores are giant horse pills that don't absorb well. My last blood test showed my D at perfect levels. (A year ago I had to take prescription strength level of vitamin D due to a deficiency.) I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: This one REALLY works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It is the only one that keeps my D deficiency on check. my physician told me I had Vitamin D deficiency so I bought some over the counter supplements (2 diff. brands) and my levels were the same. I used this one for the first time, based on the reviews and despite being a little more expensive than I was planning on spending, and on my next blood work my physician told me my levels were super good! This is my third bottle and I am recommending it to ALL my friends and family because this stuff really works. I am also trying more of their products as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Please do your research...
customer_reviews.text: I want to start off by saying I think Sports Research is a reputable company. That said...the directions for dosage of this vitamin D supplement should be changed to every other day because it's not a low dosage. I found out that vitamin D supplements can cause hypercalcemia. I used Now brand prior to using this company and the directions were take 1 capsule every other day. However, this brands suggests 1 cap daily. You do the math. I'm not saying it's a bad product...but I don't take it daily anymore. Please research supplements before taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Owens Jones

customer_reviews.title: White spots inside of gel caps!
customer_reviews.text: When I received my package I opened it and went to take one but when I poured some out some of them had very odd white spots floating inside of them. I'm unsure if it mY be bc they r made with coconut oil or if they just aren't good. I'm trying to find out how to go about finding out if this is normal or if I should be requesting a new bottle but I can't seem to find a place to inquire about it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have Vitamin D deficiency and have to take 10,000 IU daily. Decided to try this brand because of the great price and did not work at all for me after trying it for a month. Had to go back to what I was using before.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Be warned
customer_reviews.text: Please do not take these unless you have a deficiency. The normal daily recommended dose is 4,000iU and this alone is 5,000iU. I started taking these along with my normal diet (which already contains vitamin D) and became sick. It’s been about a week and I’ve been dealing with stomach pains. stopping immediately. Unless you’re deficient, go find another vitamin with much lower levels of iU
customer_reviews.author: Adam Koneval

customer_reviews.title: Good for immunity and easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I saw Dr. Rhonda Patrick interviewed on The Joe Rogan Experience #1474 recently, and she said that there is some evidence indicating that the human body's immune system's defense against coronavirus is increased and benefitted by Vitamin D. That's one of the main reasons I wanted this supplement. Sports Research as a company and a brand has always given me good experiences. And for this Vitamin D supplement specifically, I love that it's delivered in easy-to-swallow capsules and paired with coconut oil. The latter point there is important from a nutritional standpoint because since Vitamin D is fat soluble, with coconut oil—a high-fat (and healthy) substance—it's more likely to be more bioavailable to the body.
customer_reviews.author: Chase F.

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch of vitamins delivered.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened this product and the pills smell completely rancid. The first bottle I ordered several months ago was fine. This bottle Is not and I cannot return. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!!!
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this supplement to avoid soy but became severely Vitamin D deficient as a result! Have never had that happen before! Starting to recover now slowly after switching to a different supplement! Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Rodney W Mays

customer_reviews.title: A Putrid rotting smell
customer_reviews.text: Noticed and increase in energy levels and better moods, exactly what I was aiming for. Unfortunately, as soon as I opened the bottle I was taken back by the rotten fish smell. Not sure why it was so potent. More so, the tablets did not cloud as I was expecting since they contain coconut oil. Is it fractionated? Due to the smell, I cannot repurchase. It just smells like a rancid product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Green

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking SR vitamin D3 soft gel capsules for 30 days to boost my immunity. About a week ago, I caught a cold (sniffles, stuffy nose, sneezing). Typically, a cold takes 5-7 days for me to feel better (sometimes even longer), but this time I literally only had symptoms for 2 days. I chose SR brand, because my primary care physician recommended this brand, due to my bloodwork showing I’m Vitamin D deficient. I like that these gel capsules area made with coconut oil, instead of some cheap filler like soybean oil or palm oil like some other brands use. I know that with SR I’m getting a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: W. Pettigrew

customer_reviews.title: A great Product
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this vitamin D3 product. The coconut oil for better absorption is a good idea. My last blood test showed my D at perfect levels. (A year ago I had to take prescription strength level of vitamin D due to a deficiency.) I also take 500 mg of magnesium with it, which is advisable for when taking vitamin D.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. S.

customer_reviews.title: zero stars
customer_reviews.text: I had my Vitamin D3 levels checked every 3 months and they have not budged I asked for a refund and got told it takes a year too work..funny using another product and my #'s coming up..also the caps are empty..I break them w my teeth as too see if taking sublingual would help by holding liquid under tongue...several caps where empty...very upset and will do a youtube video too help save people $$$...as this company clearly will NOT REFUND and hand u excuses....bad customer service bad product period
customer_reviews.author: woodswoman

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it daily per my doctor and it's helped with my D3 levels and immunity. I love that the pill is so small and easy to take.
customer_reviews.author: Irena

customer_reviews.title: I am constantly fighting a Vitamin D deficiency, this ...
customer_reviews.text: I am constantly fighting a Vitamin D deficiency, this is the first 5000 iu supplement that enable me to get my level over 50. I can't say enough about much I appreciate the simple formulation and effectiveness. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: FiveSky

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Vitamin D
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking Sports Research 5,000 iu vitamin D for over two weeks. On Monday, Wednesday and Friday I take two of them now that it's dark and dreary outside here in WA state. It's been pretty amazing. When my vitamin D level goes down I can really feel it in my bones. Taking this has helped my body aches and my energy in general. I make sure to take my MK 7 and magnesium along with it for absorbtion. Love that they use coconut oil as a carrier oil and not soy. I will be buying future supplements from this company as I run out of my current because their ingredients are so superior!
customer_reviews.author: ofd1234

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I was low on vitamin D and had tried multiple supplements which gave little or no results. I ordered this and within a few weeks I finally felt better. I just noticed I had more energy, better sleep quality, my mood seemed more even. After so many ones tried this one I can say is a very best Vit D supplement available. With added virgin coconut oil for absorption I felt very satisfied. I started taking Vitamin K2 supplement from Sports Research and was again stunned with the quality of product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: agata

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff🌞
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been taking these vitamins for a about two weeks and what I have noticed is my nails are growing and are strong and I'm a nail biter and because of this stuff I am now trying to grow them out and care for them.. I can't wait to see what else this product will help with I'm looking forward to more energy but have not noticed that yet and as far as my winter blues that's still the same but getting better. I'm waiting for my FREE sample bottle now it's been shipped out i guess. Definitely will order again and since our Dr recommends i take a vitamin D cause im low.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Not getting enough sunshine for vitamin D? This will help!
customer_reviews.text: I had a blood test done a few months ago and I was low on vitamin D, so I purchased this one to supplement. I liked that it's made with coconut oil and view it as a bonus. This also contains 360 softgels, so it will last me about a year if I take 1 a day. I can't speak on exactly what I felt with this product as this is a vitamin and the effects are too subtle to notice, but I'm severely low in it and my doctor recommended that I take a D vitamin supplement. Overall I'm satisfied with the quantity, quality, and price of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Neur0n

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by Sports Research - zero customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This was my second bottle, I was totally happy with the first, but this one arrived all the capsules in a big clump and I can't separate them. I tried shaking them, adding two of the little moisture absorbing pouches from other vitamins, poking at the blob, nothing loosens more than a few pills. I emailed Sports Research 2 weeks ago now and have heard ZERO response. So, thank heavens for Amazon return policy - they are being shipped back and I selected an alternate brand. I used to like Sports Research - have several of their products - but now they are all suspect. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Saresbear

customer_reviews.title: Too much
customer_reviews.text: A word of warning, the dose may be a bit too much for some average people without a known deficiency. I work inside a building all week and never see sunlight so I figured I must be needing Vitamin D and ordered this supplement. After a week of taking it daily I started to get a bad headache and was fatigued all day. I stopped taking it and had no more of these symptoms. Coconut oil is supposed to increase absorption of Vitamin D and I figure the combination of that and a very high dose was too much for me.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Healthy momma healthy baby
customer_reviews.text: Love this Gentle formula made with coconut oil. I’m a breastfeeding mother and it’s important for me to ensure my infant is getting enough vitamin D for healthy bones, teeth, immune system development, etc. from my own research online, I found information that showed studies about benefits breastfeeding and Vit D. Women who breastfeed and take at least VIT D 6400 IU daily to help meet their infants daily Vit d requirement. It’s recommended by American Academy of Pediatrics that Infants have 400 IU Vit D daily. taking this formula, I’m ensuring my baby will get the Vit D she needs to grow healthy as well as meeting my needs. Healthy momma, healthy baby.
customer_reviews.author: Clairebeth

customer_reviews.title: Vegan supplement - free gift disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I like that the ingredients are vegan although they are not organic, which was sad. Also, it came with a free gift coupon stating “get a free bottle on us.” It’s very misleading, because after filling out the form I chose from six different products, none of which are the product I purchased. I wanted another free bottle of vegan vitamin D, that wasn’t an option. When my package came the air seal on my bottle wasn’t very tight either, which was a little concerning. Other than that I hope the product works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Nebulon

customer_reviews.title: Heat fused contents and bottle to a solid mass
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this product as 99% of the contents fused to itself and the bottle as a solid mass. Better packaging when shipping to a hot climate and a light color bottle when a gel coating may be better.
customer_reviews.author: acacheofjewels

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I think this D3 is a great product. I love that the ingredients are non-gmo and that these are easy to swallow. My 8 year old just pops it in her mouth and spits out the shell- taste like coconut oil. We started taking these more consistent this Winter to keep the flu and cold away. I will say that we have not been really sick at all. Not sure if I can give all of the credit to D3, but I believe it is contributing to the boost in our immune systems. I also had something going on with my knee a few weeks ago, and after taking these more consistently, that has completely disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua & Jamila

customer_reviews.title: Price and Quality = Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The Doctors Office literally just called with my Blood Test results. My Vitamin D is 80. When we found I was deficient my number was 20. The Doctor told me to get some obscure brand with a very low iu per serving and in a year it went up 5 points. I’m on my third bottle of this product and take 100,000 International Units per month. My Vitamin D level increased about 25 points per year. I will take less now that my level is on the high end. She said 2000 iu a day. This is a great product with a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Bbellbbad

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS ROTTEN
customer_reviews.text: I opened the bottle and immediately gagged. It smells like something died inside of that bottle! I don’t see how that can be normal?? I’m not taking any chances. Funny I only see a few other reviews though that mention the horrible smell.....Hopefully I can get a refund or a new bottle if I just received a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Hillnm

customer_reviews.title: 3High Quality, the Coconut Oil makes the difference!
customer_reviews.text: I had a severe vitamin D deficiency and this vitamin D helped me turn my life around! The coconut oil allows it to absorb better than any other brand, and I have tried many in my search to feel better. I've taken it for years now, it's probably the one supplement, aside from Source Naturals Wellness Formula, that I buy again and again. This is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Xiao Chen

customer_reviews.title: This Product Made a Noticeable Difference
customer_reviews.text: This is the best quality D3 I've used. Ever since switching to the Sports Research brand I've noticed a definite improvement in my daily energy levels and general feeling of well being. I no longer feel fatigue in the afternoon as I used to. I think I am sleeping sounder and wake more rested as well -- I don't know the connection between the D3 and my improved sleep, but I am very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: WG Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love this High Potency Vitamin D3.  I like the fact that it is Non-GMO, Gluten Free with no unhealthy additives or fillers.
customer_reviews.text: Love this High Potency Vitamin D3. I like the fact that it is Non-GMO, Gluten Free with no unhealthy additives or fillers. Also, the softgels are small and easy to swallow. I am ill and am unable to get outside much so I take it to make up for lost time in the sun, bone, joint and immune system support and it is also good for my psoriasis. I could tell a big difference in my well being when taking this product, unlike other brands I have tried. Great deal for the price. I have been taking this product for 4 months and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: My vitamin D level was found to be quite low, took Rx for 30 days, then switched to OTC 5000 daily per FNP recommendations. I chose this one based on reviews and apparently is working well. I can't say I feel any different; I didn't feel anything (no symptoms) when level was so low; but my levels are in the normal range now, so I guess it's doing its thing and I'll continue to take.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee Farris

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: The FDA guidelines for Vit D3 are much too low. Many individuals, particularly those in the NorthEast US suffer from inadequate Vit D. 2,000iu - 5,000iu is a good range for most people (lower end for those in sunnier climes). This is my favorite D3 thus far. Great quality product from a reputable company, 360 softgels last a long time making it very affordable, and the fact that it is encapsulated in pure coconut oil is a plus! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mtnmystic

customer_reviews.title: Great as a supplement, watch the dosage
customer_reviews.text: I take one a day to combat a mild Vitamin D deficiency. Briefly, in the beginning, I was taking three a day because I didn't pay attention to the dose - so if you also did this and came to the reviews to find out if you've suicided your kidneys the answer is probably not. After a week of giga-dosing myself I read the label and took the proper amount and all has been well since. Would recommend for those with Vit D deficiency, if your personal doc agrees.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Along with daily magnesium and calcium, I take 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Along with daily magnesium and calcium, I take 3 - 5000 iu pills per day during the fall / winter, and only 1 - 5,000 iu in the spring / summer. I began taking it to help strengthen my immune system. After years where colds turned to bronchitis, I found taking D3 has completely eliminated bronchitis, and I don't even get full blown colds anymore. Then as a secondary benefit, I have found it very helpful in a recent periodontal bone graft procedure; even the periodontist was extremely surprised at how well the bone was regrowing just weeks later. I attribute that success to my daily supplementing of D3 and Calcium.
customer_reviews.author: A Mixed Bag

customer_reviews.title: My levels plummeted!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to switch all my supplements to vegan options so I decided to give this brand a try. I’ve been taking this for a few weeks now. Just had my bloodwork done and my levels were lower than my previous test. I’ll be going back to my old brand.
customer_reviews.author: ZombieQueen

customer_reviews.title: No flavor, great product for me
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered these Vit D3 pills it was because they were the least expensive option that day. Since then, I have chosen to reorder them because they are great! I take them every day and when I've had to miss a day, I am really feeling it. My only wish is that the bottle came with more pills inside so I could order in the cold months and have a supply on hand through the hot months!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Strom

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting smell
customer_reviews.text: So I'm returning these, I just got them yesterday and opened them today but there is a horrible smell. Like poop and rotten fish. I've never taken vitamins d so I thought maybe that's how it is supposed to smell so I looked through the reviews, apparently it's not supposed to have this smell. idk if I got a bad batch but I'm going to have it exchanged for another one. I'm hoping then it will be good and that it doesn't happen ever again. I will give a fair chance once I receive them and update my review then. I'm hoping these turn out well
customer_reviews.author: Apm

customer_reviews.title: Fingers crossed
customer_reviews.text: In late June, I fell and fractured my humerus bone. My orthopedic doctor said that due to all of the chemo treatments and the Keytruda immunotherapy drug my bones are soft. He suggested to get a vitamin D supplement. Or see my oncologist to get an injection of Vitamin D. I decided to go and find a supplement that was available that had good recommendations and I came up with this one. Time will tell wether this works. Fingers crossed that this will work. I put it on auto delivery. The pills are easy to swallow Nd I definitely like the idea that it’s free of added ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Gary -Florida

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I took some time to post this review because I wanted to have results before commenting anything about the product, with that said, I’ve been taking this for some time now due to very low levels of this vitamin, I had labs done on August 1st and the doctor said that my vitamin D level in my body is great, that very few people have good lab results when it comes to this vitamin. So, this thing works. I have never ask for the free bottle when you give a review or anything like that, I wanted results not free bottles of something that didn’t work but this brand does so go for it if you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella M.

customer_reviews.title: A little thinking goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: About 2/3 yrs ago got on SRFIT D3, then I forget how good my energy level was and what was making this happen. Another brand had a good rating and a discount price. I ordered and cont. to use this product not knowing why I felt rundown. Then I seen your ad again and recalled I use to take SRFIT. Sometimes you have to stop and think!!!!! BIKERDUDE
customer_reviews.author: bikerdude

customer_reviews.title: Best D3 I've Taken
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this D3 supplement for the last 2 years and it's - quite simply - the best D3 I've ever taken. After listening to Dr. Rhonda Patrick discuss vitamin D deficiencies, I started taking much higher doses and I haven't been sick since. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: SolemnFollies

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamin D Supplement
customer_reviews.text: These Vitamins D pills came very fast! They are very small, easy to swallow & smell like coconuts. I got these because I had low levels of vitamin D in my blood test and I experience SAD in the winter months. I read coconut oil is an amazing healthy oil with great health benefits for the body, so why not try that combined with vitamin D? So far so good! I have been taking 1 pill per day, honestly I don't think I feel a difference with my mood yet, but I will definitely continue to take them! I do feel a bit more energetic though. (I have been taking 1 pill daily for 2 months)
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Right Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I'm adopting the teacher-student concept of starting with an A and lets see where it goes from there. If for any reason I'm not satisfied, I'll be back to re-evaluate. I have been taking VD3-5000 for some time now. Recommended by my doctor due to health reasons and lifestyle (osteoarthritis and being indoor a lot). I have decided to try this Sports Research brand because I like the idea of coconut oil instead of soy. I don't know if it will make much difference at my age now to be more health conscious; but I certainly don't think it will do any harm.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea W

customer_reviews.title: Healthy vitamin D levels are more important now than ever before
customer_reviews.text: As a middle aged active woman, I know how incredibly important healthy vitamin D levels are. Throw in a covid pandemic, and the need to keep those levels at an appropriate level become increasingly important. As a gluten free vegetarian, this product was absolutely perfect for me. Most other Vitamin D supplements on the market contain animal products. I was horrified to learn this. So this product is perfect for others who are like me.
customer_reviews.author: allison j

customer_reviews.title: Must absorb really well
customer_reviews.text: I had low Vit D in my blood work awhile back. Doc gave me script for 50k ius taken once a week. I used that, bu thad some side effects and it didn't raise my Vit D levels to within normal limits. Got these instead and my last blood work showed within normal limits. Can't complain. Also coconut oil turns into a white solid at lower temps IIRC. That's why they might be "cloudy", but not contaminated.
customer_reviews.author: JustAGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. A little too strong for a general supplement
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the highest potency D3 because it was well reviewed and seemed to be the best bang for my buck. The design of the package was spiffy and the softgels were easy to swallow. Unfortunately after I purchased the product a study came out that suggested that prolonged use of super high doses of vitamin D may not be beneficial. I ended up getting a different bottle with a more medium dose (2000 IU). That being said, I still think that the high dose package could benefit someone who really needed it, but for someone like me who is basically healthy and just looking for a basic supplement it was just a little too much.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Deliberately misleading marketing
customer_reviews.text: Offers a free bottle then they don’t honor the coupon. Deliberately misleading marketing
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement Products!
customer_reviews.text: Your vitamin D and all of your that I have tried are excellent. I am pleased that your vitamin D softgel contains coconut oil. The size of the pill is tiny as well! The benefits of vitamin D are countless, and there seems to be an epidemic of deficiency. I have used other Sports Research supplements, and my experience has been consistent - fantastic! Thanks for a job very well done!
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin D3  with Coconut Oil
customer_reviews.text: Main function of vitamin D is to increase the intestinal absorption of calcium for good bone health. Vitamin D also helps strengthen the immune system and aids cell to cell in the body. take it after a meal may be taken with or without food. Our body needs VTM D3. Take care of your health... I Do...
customer_reviews.author: Alberto C.

customer_reviews.title: Feeling human again!
customer_reviews.text: After finding out that my joint pain, muscle fatigue and weakness was being caused,in part, by a Vitamin D-3 deficiency, I ordered a bottle of Sports Research supplement. I like that it's mixed with coconut oil for better absorption and I'm feeling much better. One way I can tell when I started taking it is by the health of my fingernails. The new growth is smooth and thick. I hadn't realized just how much the deficiency was affecting me!
customer_reviews.author: Scubabon

customer_reviews.title: Great D3!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking Sports Research Vitamin D3 for over a year now. It’s the best Vitamin D3 product on the market. I love that it’s made with Coconut Oil. What makes it even better is it’s NON-GMO & Gluten Free. The soft gels are soft, small & easy to swallow. The 50mg dosage with 360 gels sells at an unbeatable price. I use many other supplements by Sports Research. The newest I’ve purchased is the Collagen which is great. SR is a trusted brand & company. I’ll always use their product. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: meshelle

customer_reviews.title: Great start
customer_reviews.text: I just received the D3 vitamins today so my input won't matter until later, but I love the look of the bottle. It's edgy yet professional. The capsules are so pretty and clean. They were very easy to take with my breakfast. I can't wait until I begin seeing results. I was diagnosed with chronic fatigue syndrome and a vitamin D deficient is showing to be a main culprit for this as well as my low levels of testosterone. My doc ordered for 5,000 iu of vitamin D3. I can't wait to feel better and live the athletic life I've always known!
customer_reviews.author: A. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Too strong
customer_reviews.text: I am 5 6 150 pounds and this stuff is way too much for me :( it makes me feel like throwing up and nauseous.
customer_reviews.author: Dkay

customer_reviews.title: Great Product so far
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why did not give 5 stars for absorbency is I am waiting for the longer term lab results to confirm longitudinal gains. The packaging is sturdy and easy to read. The product is easy to swallow, meets my dietary needs, is of high quality, and has no unpleasant smells/taste/aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: spiralated

customer_reviews.title: I’ve got the Pep in my step back!
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful... Easy to take and tasteless... I work nights and was feeling more sluggish each day and my Dr recommend that I start taking some vitamin D... After much research and trial and error... I found this product and within a week of taking it the pep in my step was back and I have continued to see improvement the longer I’m taking it... Thank You!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maile Richie

customer_reviews.title: Helped me to stop shedding hair!
customer_reviews.text: I need Vitamin D3 in my life because I just do not get enough sun, and your 5000 high potency Vitamin D3 which is enhanced with coconut oil is exactly what I was looking for. It's easy to take, was a great price, and I just feel better knowing that I am putting it into my body. Also, I was previously taking a different Vitamin D3 from another company. That one had safflower oil in it. The safflower oil did not agree with me and made me feel super bloated. I'm thrilled that your Vitamin D3 is enhanced with coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Small pill, easy to swallow, no after taste
customer_reviews.text: Small pills about the size of an OTC ibuprofen or so. It’s difficult to comment on the effect because I did not have a vitamin D deficiency that I am aware of and my physical is scheduled later on this year. I can say that I have been feeling better with more energy and a clear mind since I started taking these pills. Again, that is just how I feel and it might be just my brain making me feel good because I am taking the vitamin after I heard Dr. Ronda Patrick talk about how most of us have a vitamin D deficiency and talked about all the benefits that’s vitamin D brings.
customer_reviews.author: PursuitOfHappiness1776

customer_reviews.title: will buy again
customer_reviews.text: After doing extensive research regarding vitamin D3 I began to search for a product of high quality at an affordable rate. As a marathon runner and active martial artist I new I needed something legit and this product repeatedly appeared at the top of the list. I am happy with the deliver time, customer service and overall quality of the product. I will definitely recommend this to product to friends and family. Get your D3.
customer_reviews.author: vrajakishor das

customer_reviews.title: A safe way to get D3
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in tandem with a calcium supplement. Both my husband and I are taking it, my husband sunburns easily so this was a safer way to get the vitamin D3 we need. So far we've not had any problems with the product and are quite satisfied with the listing of other ingredients in this formula.
customer_reviews.author: FeuerWolf

customer_reviews.title: Strong odor of rancid oil
customer_reviews.text: Not even 1 Star. It was rancid. The odor almost knocked me over when I opened it. Now I have to write it off as I pitch it in the garbage because it’s not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: CindyCK

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this brand, very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Earlier this year, after receiving my blood work results, my GP informed myself I had low levels of Vitamin D3. He suggested a few dietary changes along with a suggested 10,000iu intake of a reputable brand Vitamin D3 supplementation. I did my diligence on Amazon and carefully read at least a hundred different Vit D3 brands reviews. After careful consideration I selected the Sport Research`s brand. I could not be more pleased with my purchase. I have actually noticed an undeniable boost to my immune system along with an actual decrease in my blood pressure. Love the fact the SR D3 is manufactured with Coconut Oil, another positive feature. Again, incredibly pleased and highly recommend this brand!
customer_reviews.author: David Delisa

customer_reviews.title: This Product Causes Rashes and Skin Irritation
customer_reviews.text: Took this product for 2 days and now have an intense rash with a burning sensation on multiple parts of my body. I rarely leave reviews but if I manage to reach anyone with this, here is my message: THEIR INGREDIENT PANEL IS A LIE. It will cause skin irritation and swelling which can lead to trouble breathing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: No rancid smell like some reviewers are commenting on. I suspect those are fake reviews from compete, or some capsules broke or melted in the bottle. I smell or taste nothing. Very tiny which i like. There seems to be coconut oil in as described. I put in the refrigerator for 6 hours and checked the color - you could see part of the capsule was cloudy as it should be with coconut oil in it. I have no idea if it's doing anything for me as i did not do a baseline test.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect during COVID! And easy to swallow with no smell.
customer_reviews.text: I've been cooped up in the house too much during shelter in place and though you wouldn't think it would make a huge difference, after starting this daily my lack of sunshine blues melted away. The pills are tiny, have no odor (so many supplements do!) and unlike many D supplements, they aren't loaded with sugar. If you have darker skin, if you're lactose intolerant, or you're just getting less sunlight than usual--buying these is a no-brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Schirr

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Small and easy to swallow. I don’t notice a funny taste or smell at all. I take a 2000iu and have no problems at all. I have noticed a difference in just a few days of starting this vitamin. I am not as groggy when I wake up and have more energy throughout the entire day. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy I came across this...
customer_reviews.text: Great value priced supplement that is probably better than most vitamins you can buy at the drug store. These tiny soft gel pills are also easy to swallow. A years worth of high quality vitamin D for less than ten bucks? I had to get it. I was almost out of a private brand (begins with ‘wal’ and ends with green) drugstore bottle and got this. This is MUCH less expensive and appears to be better quality. Without a laboratory though, I can’t be sure. Either way, I’m quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: This is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have increased difficulty absorbing vitamin D and require large daily doses to improve my vitamin D levels. My nutritionists said that vitamin D is best absorbed while eating something fatty. I take all of my medications at night before bed, so finding this saved me the extra step of having to eat something before bed. The crazy part, it absorbs so well I was able to decrease my daily vitamin D dose! I have not been able to do that for years!!! I am shook.
customer_reviews.author: SydRose

product_meta.title: Vitamin D3 (5000iu/125mcg) Infused with Coconut Oil ~ Non-GMO & Gluten Free (360 Mini Liquid Softgels)
feature_bullets: THE SUNSHINE VITAMIN: SR Vitamin D3 delivers the same biologically active form of vitamin D produced in the body as a result of direct sunlight without the risk of unprotected UVB exposure.

COCONUT OIL: The original Vitamin D3 brand with Coconut oil. Vitamin D3 is fat soluble and difficult for the body to absorb if not taken with a fat. To help aid with absorption we blend our Vitamin D3 with Coconut Oil.
EASY TO SWALLOW: Contains 5000iu (125mcg) of Vtiamin D3 (as Cholecalciferol) in a easy-to-swallow liquid softgel capsule.
OVERCOME DEFICIENCY: As many as 50% of the people living in the United States may be deficient in Vitamin D.
MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: All Sports Research (SR) vitamins & supplements come with a 90 day Money Back Guarantee (See below for details).^
